resources.string: Le ID de session es expirate, tu debe authenticar te de novo
Tu debe acceder pro vider tu statistica
Tu debe acceder pro definir le objectivo quotidian
CV Project es un app non official pro Mozilla Common Voice. Illo es disveloppate per Saverio Morelli sin ulle assistentia o societate con Mozilla.
Si tu procede, tu concorda con le Terminos de Servicio de Mozilla Common Voice.
Iste le application besonia de permisso \"Microphono\" pro registrar tu voce.

Tu pote reportar bugs sur GitHub o Telegram. Pro adjutar le disveloppator a comprender le problema rapidemente, tu deberea attaccar a tu reporto le file de registro del app. Le app besoniante del permisso \"Immagazinage\" pro salvar le file de registro.
Tu pote mesmo contribuer sin connexion. Le \"Modo sin connexion\" sera activate automaticamente e tu pote continua a registrar e ascoltar sin un connexion a internet.
Tu pote eliger le thema clar o le thema obscur. Tu pote cambiar isto plus tarde in Parametros.
Alcun actiones ha gestos correspondente. Per exemplo, tu pote saltar un phrase in Parlar glissante a sinistra.
Tu pote personalisar iste gestos in Parametros.
Tu pote junger te al gruppo Telegram pro obtener novas e assistentia.
Avante! Elige que lingua tu amarea parlar o ascoltar. Le app essera alsi monstrate in ille lingua si un traduction es disponibile.
Pro modificar tu informationes, va al sito web de Common Voice.

string.name: txt_gender_other
string.comment: Label in Profile | Other gender, so not specified

resources.string: Congratulationes! Tu ha justo attingite le nivello {{*{{n_level}}*}}.
Io ha jam un ligamine de verification
Le ligamine de verification non es valide
Supporta mi labor. Offere me un caffe ðŸ˜„
Functionalitate experimental activate.\nNove functionalitates pote esser instabile e insecur.
Salvamento del registros al file activate.\nTu pote attachar le file log.txt quando tu signala un problema.\nLege plus sur GitHub.
Monstrar le catena que me identifica in le application
Salto del confirmation de registration activate.\nTu ora potera inviar registrationes sin deber primo ascoltar los.
Le sono indicator del registration es ora activate.\nUn sono indicara quando tu initiara o cessara le registration.
Si te place iste application, lassa un revision sur Google Play Store.
Le application non es (completemente) traducite in iste lingua.\nTu pote collaborar a traducer le application sur Crowdin.
Monstrar etiquettas sub le icones del menu
Lege le terminos de servicio de Mozilla Common Voice
Lege le lineas guida pro le validationes
Pone tu valutation sur Google Play

string.name: txt_no_experimental_features_now_available
string.comment: Text in Settings where there are not any experimental features available

resources.string: Nulle functionalitates experimental es ora disponibile

string.name: txt_show_sentence_at_the_ending
string.comment: Switch-Button in Settings | This permits you to enable/disable the showing of the sentence text (in Listen) just when the clip is completed

resources.string: Monstrar le texto del phrases quando le registrationes es ascoltate completemente
Monstrar le icone del reporto (in alto a dextera) in vice del button (in basso)

string.name: enable_ads_google_play_in_section
string.comment: Switch-Button in Settings | Do not translate {{*{{section_name}}*}} -> it indicates 'Home', 'Speak' and 'Listen'

resources.string: Barra colorate de progresso del objectivo quotidian

string.name: txt_speak_and_listen
string.comment: Title in Settings || Don't translate {{*{{listen_name}}*}} and {{*{{speak_name}}*}}

resources.string: Light theme also for the sentence to read/to validate in Speak and Listen (when the light theme is turned on).
Pulsa le icone infra pro initiar registration.
Pulsa le icone infra pro cessar registration.
Si tu ha parlate correctemente, invia le registration.\nSi tu ha parlate incorrectemente, tu pote registrar le phrase de novo.
Ascolta le integre registration pro verificar que illo es correcte.
Pulsa le icone infra pro cessar ascolta.
Registration troppo longe. Durata maxime 10 secundas.
Le registration es troppo breve. Reproba.
Falta a inviar registration! Tu pote reprobar o pulsar le {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button.
Pulsa le icone infra pro ascoltar le retalio.
Pulsa le icone infra pro cessar le ascolta.
Si le retalio es correcte, pulsa le pollice in alto.\nSi errate, pulsa le pollice in basso.
Pulsa le icone infra pro reascoltar le retalio.
Error. Pulsa le {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button pro continuar.
Falta a inviar le resultato. Tu pote reprobar o pulsar le {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button.

string.name: txt_closing
string.comment: Label in Listen & Label in Speak

resources.string: Error. Il non ha plus registrationes disponibile pro iste lingua.
Tu ha exhaurite le phrases disponibile sin connexion. Connecte te a internet pro discargar altere phrases a registrar.
Tu ha exhaurite le registrationes disponibile sin connexion. Connecte te a internet pro discargar altere registrationes a validar.
Tu pote registrar {{*{{n_sentences}}*}} altere phrases ante que tu debe connecter te a internet.
Tu pote validar {{*{{n_clips}}*}} altere registrationes ante que tu debe connecter te a internet.

string.name: txt_listening_clip
string.comment: Text in Listen | This text indicates you turned on 'Show sentences text when clips completed'

resources.string: Le \"{{*{{feature_name}}*}}\" es activate. Va a Parametros pro disactivar lo.
Le texto del phrase es celate
Il non ha ulle plus phrases in le servitor de Common Voice.
Il non ha ulle plus registrationes in le servitor de Common Voice.

string.name: text_continue_to_validate_1
string.comment: Motivational sentence in Listen | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}

resources.string: You have already validated {{*{{number}}*}} clips in a row, continue this amazing work!

string.comment: Motivational sentence in Listen | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}

resources.string: Continue to validate clips, you validated {{*{{number}}*}} clips in a row.

string.comment: Motivational sentence in Listen | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}

resources.string: Excellent work! You have already validated {{*{{number}}*}} clips in a row.

string.comment: Motivational sentence in Listen | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}

resources.string: Wow, you have superhuman powers! You validated {{*{{number}}*}} clips in a row!

resources.string: You sent {{*{{number}}*}} recordings in a row.

resources.string: Congratulations! You achieved the milestone of {{*{{number}}*}} recorded sentences. Keep going.

string.comment: Motivational sentence in Speak | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}

resources.string: Wow, you have superhuman powers! You recorded {{*{{number}}*}} sentences in a row!

string.comment: Motivational sentence in Listen | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}} and {{*{{dailygoal}}*}}

resources.string: You miss only {{*{{number}}*}} clips to achieve your daily goal of {{*{{dailygoal}}*}}!

resources.string: You miss only {{*{{number}}*}} sentences to achieve your daily goal of {{*{{dailygoal}}*}}!

string.name: toast_speed_set_successfully
string.comment: Toast message in Speak and Listen | Don't translate {{*{{speed_value}}*}}

resources.string: Tu non es connectite a internet. Connecte te a wifi o a datos mobile, pois pulsa le button infra.
Isto es le phrase que tu debe registrar.
Un message pro guidar te apparera hic.
Si non te place le phrase, tu pote toccar hic pro saltar e obtener un altere.
Tocca iste icone pro initiar registration.
Tocca iste icone pro cessar registration.
Tocca iste icone pro reproducer tu registration.
Tocca iste icone pro re-registrar si tu ha facite un error.
Tocca iste icone pro reproducer tu registration de novo.
Tocca iste button pro inviar tu registration.
Isto es le phrase/retalio que tu debe validar.
Si non te place le retalio, tu pote toccar sur iste button pro saltar e obtener un altero.
Tocca iste icone pro reproducer le registration.
Tocca iste icone pro cessar reproducer le registration.
Tocca iste icone si tu desira ascoltar le registration de novo.
Si le registration concorda con le phrase, tocca iste icone pro acceptar lo.
Si le registration non concorda le phrase, tocca iste icone pro rejectar lo.
Si tu non es secur si acceptar o rejectar un registration, tu pote leger le lineas guida official pro le validation sur Mozilla Discourse.\nTu alsi pote trovar iste ligamine plus tarde in Parametros.
Desolate, iste functionalitate non existe ancora.\nNos labora constantemente pro meliorar le application, assi re-controla plus tarde pro vider si illo ha essite addite.

string.name: new_badge_earnt_message
string.comment: Message text when you got a new badge

resources.string: Bravo! Tu ha justo ganiate un nove insignia.\nVa a {{*{{profile}}*}} > {{*{{all_badges}}*}} pro vider tote tu insignias.
Tu recipeva iste insignia perque tu ha validate al minus {{*{{n_clips}}*}} registrationes.
Tu recipeva iste insignia perque tu registrate al minus {{*{{n_sentences}}*}} phrases.
Tu recipeva iste insignia perque tu ha validate o registrate al minus {{*{{n_total}}*}} registrationes.
Illo non functiona.\nReproba, o contacta le disveloppator.

string.name: messageDialogErrorCode
string.comment: Message text | Generic error | Don't translate EX-{{*{{error_code}}*}}

resources.string: Illo non functiona. Reproba o contacta le disveloppator.\nCodice error: EX-{{*{{error_code}}*}}
Tu debe primo acceder sur le sito web de Common Voice e acceptar le politica de confidentialitate.
Si tu ha problemas con le sito web official de Common Voice, signala los sur le foros Mozilla Discourse o sur le repositorio GitHub proque Mozilla pote los remediar.
Te place le app? Tu pote supportar mi labor. Compra me un caffe per PayPal o LiberaPay.
Tu es ora sin connexion e le app mutava automaticamente a Modo sin connexion.\nId es: tu pote continuar a registrar e validar, ma le requestas sera inviate plus tarde.
Tu pote dicer quando tu es in modo sin connexion per recercar iste icone sur le schermo:
Tu pote toccar ille icone pro vider registrationes e phrases discargate.
Le Modo sin connexion non es activate, assi tu non pote usar le application sin un connexion a internet.\nPro usar le functionalitate Modo sin connexion, activa lo in Parametros.
Hallo, vole tu supportar gratis mi labor? Si te place le app, considera activar le banners in le parametros.
Are you sure you want to go back and lose the recording?
Are you sure you want to skip and lose the recording?
Are you sure you want to reset all app data?

string.name: text_opened_the_app_n_times_in_a_row
string.comment: Message text | Do not translate {{*{{number}}*}}, it's an integer '> 1'

resources.string: Well done! You opened the app {{*{{number}}*}} days in a row.

string.name: text_share_n_times_in_a_row
string.comment: Message text to share on socials

resources.string: I\'ve opened {{*{{number}}*}} days the CV Project app in a row! Download it also you to contribute to the Common Voice project via your smartphone.
Elige quante phrases tu desira a registrar e quante registrationes validar (summa de illos) cata die.

Ben facite! Tu ha complite tu objectivo quotidian.\nTu ha validate {{*{{n_clips}}*}} registration(es) e registrate {{*{{n_sentences}}*}} phrase(s).\nSenti te libere de continuar contribuer a Common Voice.

string.name: share_daily_goal
string.comment: Button when you achieve a daily goal

string.name: share_daily_goal_text_on_social
string.comment: This is the text will go shared | Don't translate {{*{{link}}*}}, hashtags (#CVAndroid, #CommonVoice) and tag (@mozilla)

resources.string: Io ha justo complite mi objectivo quotidian pro @mozilla #CommonVoice per le #CVProject.\nJunge te e collabora! Installa CV Project per Google Play, F-Droid o Huawei AppGallery now {{*{{link}}*}}
Iste objectivo quotidian non es un functionalitate official de Mozilla. Illo es solo un functionalitate de iste le application.

string.name: daily_goal_motivational_message
string.comment: Message text | The comma ',' is used to divide 'thousands'. Use the correct sign in your language

resources.string: 10,000 horas es attingibile in poco plus de 6 menses si 1000 personas registra 45 phrases pro die.

Un nove version del application es disponibile (version {{*{{n_version}}*}}). Tu pote actualisar lo ex tu favorite magazinage (F-Droid, Google Play, Huawei AppGallery, Amazon AppStore) o directemente de GitHub.
